title: Automobile industry will contribute to India's rise as third largest economy
description: The Ministry of Heavy Industries is overseeing the Rs 25,938 crore Production Linked Incentive (PLI) scheme for Automobile and Auto Components (PLI-AUTO Scheme). An official statement said results are coming as companies have commenced making investments and vehicle models are being approved for availing the scheme benefits.
